name: C++
description: Learn advanced C++ step by step.

tutorials.title: 1. Setting Up C++ and Hello World
tutorials.description: Install a C++ compiler, set up your IDE, and write your first program.

tutorials.title: 2. Classes, Objects, and Const Correctness
tutorials.description: Understand classes, constructors, destructors, and const correctness.

tutorials.title: 3. Inheritance and Polymorphism
tutorials.description: Learn how C++ handles inheritance, virtual functions, and polymorphism.

tutorials.title: 4. Templates and STL
tutorials.description: Write generic code with templates and leverage the Standard Template Library (STL).

tutorials.title: 5. Modern C++ (C++11/14/17/20)
tutorials.description: Discover modern C++ features like smart pointers, lambdas, move semantics, and concepts.
